channel.title: Microsoft Developer Blogs
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, announcements, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【PromptFlow Serve – Benchmark Result Analysis】PromptFlow Serve – 基准结果分析
item.description: 【In this post we discuss how to test the throughput of PromptFlow pf-serve module and key learnings doing so. We explore the impact on throughput and performance the different WSGI and ASGI hosting methods have and the importance of engineering your Python nodes with the async await pattern for I/O.】在这篇文章中，我们讨论如何测试 PromptFlow pf-serve 模块的吞吐量以及这样做的关键知识。我们探讨了不同 WSGI 和 ASGI 托管方法对吞吐量和性能的影响，以及使用 I/O 异步等待模式设计 Python 节点的重要性。

item.title: 【Azure Boards, September Update】Azure Boards，九月更新
item.description: 【September was a productive month for Azure Boards, and we’re excited to share some of the new features coming your way. Area and Iteration Level Fields Area and iteration level fields have been crucial for querying or displaying results based on their specific levels: (Root) Level 1 / Level 2 / Level 3 / etc. […]】9 月对于 Azure Boards 来说是富有成效的一个月，我们很高兴与您分享一些即将推出的新功能。区域和迭代级别字段区域和迭代级别字段对于根据其特定级别查询或显示结果至关重要：（根）级别 1 / 级别 2 / 级别 3 / 等。 [...]

item.title: 【Azure SDK Release (September 2024)】Azure SDK 版本（2024 年 9 月）
item.description: 【The Azure SDKs release every month. This post includes the month's highlights and release notes.】Azure SDK 每月发布一次。这篇文章包括本月的亮点和发行说明。

item.title: 【Announcing Semantic Kernel for Java 1.3.0】宣布推出 Java 语义内核 1.3.0
item.description: 【Hello again Java AI developers! We are announcing the 1.3.0 release of the Semantic Kernel for Java. You can find our updates on the GitHub repository and the artifacts on Maven Central. This release will mark the final experimental version of our Vector Store functionality. Vector search is now available across all our supported vector stores. We’ve implemented approximate search […]】Java AI 开发者们大家好！我们宣布推出 Java 语义内核 1.3.0 版本。您可以在 GitHub 存储库上找到我们的更新，并在 Maven Central 上找到我们的工件。此版本将标志着我们的矢量存储功能的最终实验版本。现在，我们所有支持的矢量商店都提供矢量搜索。我们已经实现了近似搜索[...]

item.title: 【SK Python Kernel Reaches 1,000,000 downloads】SK Python 内核下载量突破 1,000,000 次
item.description: 【We are thrilled to announce that Microsoft Semantic Kernel Python Kernel has reached an incredible milestone of 1,000,000 downloads! This achievement would not have been possible without the unwavering support and enthusiasm of our community. We want to extend our heartfelt thanks to every developer, contributor, and user who has embraced the Python Kernel, providing […]】我们很高兴地宣布 Microsoft Semantic Kernel Python Kernel 已达到 1,000,000 次下载的令人难以置信的里程碑！如果没有我们社区坚定不移的支持和热情，这一成就是不可能实现的。我们要向每一位拥抱 Python 内核的开发者、贡献者和用户表示衷心的感谢，他们提供了 [...]

item.title: 【Using JSON Schema for Structured Output in Python for OpenAI Models】在 OpenAI 模型的 Python 中使用 JSON 架构进行结构化输出
item.description: 【In working with AI applications, ensuring that the output generated by a language model is structured and follows a consistent format is critical—especially when handling complex tasks like solving math problems. A powerful way to achieve this is through the use of JSON Schema, which allows the AI model to produce outputs that align with […]】在使用人工智能应用程序时，确保语言模型生成的输出是结构化的并遵循一致的格式至关重要，尤其是在处理解决数学问题等复杂任务时。实现这一目标的一个强大方法是使用 JSON Schema，它允许 AI 模型生成与 [...] 一致的输出。

item.title: 【Announcing SharePoint Framework 1.20 with updates on building enterprise extensibility within Microsoft 365】发布 SharePoint 框架 1.20，其中包含有关在 Microsoft 365 中构建企业可扩展性的更新
item.description: 【We are excited to announce general availability for the SharePoint Framework 1.20. This time focus is primarily on the Microsoft Viva platform capabilities.】我们很高兴地宣布 SharePoint Framework 1.20 全面上市。这次的重点主要是 Microsoft Viva 平台功能。

item.title: 【Go 1.23.1-3 and 1.22.7-3 Microsoft builds now available】Go 1.23.1-3 和 1.22.7-3 Microsoft 版本现已推出
item.description: 【A new set of Microsoft Go builds is now available for download.】一组新的 Microsoft Go 版本现已可供下载。

item.title: 【The case of the crash when destructing a std::map】破坏 std::map 时崩溃的情况
item.description: 【Who is corrupting the map?】谁在破坏地图？

item.title: 【Tailored Code Completions for C++ Developers: Fine-tuned models are now in limited public beta for GitHub Copilot Enterprise】为 C++ 开发人员量身定制的代码完成：微调模型现已进入 GitHub Copilot Enterprise 的有限公开测试版
item.description: 【GitHub recently announced that custom models are available for GitHub Copilot Enterprise users in limited public beta. Custom models are fine-tuned on your organization’s proprietary codebases and coding practices to provide more contextually relevant and consistent inline suggestions. How It Works: Security and Privacy in Custom Models The data used to train your organization’s custom […]】GitHub 最近宣布，在有限的公开测试版中，自定义模型可供 GitHub Copilot Enterprise 用户使用。自定义模型根据您组织的专有代码库和编码实践进行微调，以提供更上下文相关且一致的内联建议。它是如何工作的：自定义模型中的安全性和隐私用于培训组织的自定义模型的数据[...]
